title: Is MacBook Air cheaper in Dubai compared to India? - Quora
tags: Comparisons of Concepts, People and Items in India

response.answer_text: Hi there There was time we used to get cheaper electronic or clothings in dubai not anymore Yes it’s good news for us I bought yesterday Mac book pro with touch pad i5 8th generation and 256 gb Ssd 126000 from relliance store for my daughter in Sharaf dubai it was 146000₹ ( after conversion) Please check this link for comparison Apple iPhone 11 cheaper in US, Dubai: Full comparison with India prices Best wishes
Yes, it is cheaper as the tax on products in Dubai is minimal or zero in most of the cases
